title: ARE THERE ANY RULES OR REGULATIONS IN PLACE THAT AFFECT THE REMOVAL OF CAMPAIGN SIGNS AFTER LOCAL ELECTIONS? IT APPEARS THAT THE MAJORITY OF THESE PLACARDS ARE PLACED IN PUBLIC RIGHT-OF-WAYS NEXT TO OUR ROADS AND TEND TO LINGER WELL AFTER ELECTIONS ARE COMPLETE. THANX--BRIAN
text:
Here's a link that has an answer for you. See the item on
campaign signs.

http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20100516/ARTICLES/100519656
